snippet: Pentagon officials emphasized that the government is working to locate Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl, who is being held captive by Afghan insurgents.
abstract: Defense Secretary Leon Panetta emphasizes that the United States government is doing everything possible to locate Sgt Bowe Bergdahl, who is being held captive by Afghan insurgents after being seized in 2009; Bergdahl's family has broken their yearlong silence on the kidnapping and announces that they are becoming frustrated with slow progress on the talks.
lead_paragraph: Pentagon officials emphasized that the government is working to locate Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl, who is being held captive by Afghan insurgents.

headline.seo: U.S. Trying to Locate Captured Soldier, Pentagon Says
headline.main: Pentagon Stresses Efforts to Recover U.S. Soldier Being Held in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Stresses Efforts to Recover U.S. Soldier Being Held in Afghanistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
